newsitem.title: USA: IBS Financial sets 15-pct stock dividend.
newsitem.headline: IBS Financial sets 15-pct stock dividend.

text.p: IBS Financial Corp said its board of directors has declared a 15 percent stock dividend to be paid on its outstanding shares of common stock.
The company said the stock dividend of one share of common stock for every 6.67 shares held is payable on May 6, record April 21.

IBS said it intends to pay the current quarterly cash dividend of $0.08 per share on the new shares received in connection with the stock dividend. It said by maintaining its current quarterly payout, this will effectively increase the company's cash dividend by 15 percent.
